byline.original: By TRIP GABRIEL and EDWARD WYATT
byline.contributor: Trip Gabriel reported from Perry, and Ed Wyatt reported from Harriman, Tenn. Julia Preston contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Republican presidential candidates Herman Cain and Michele Bachmann deliver blistering attacks on illegal immigration during campaign speeches in Iowa.
snippet: In campaign speeches on Saturday, Herman Cain said he would build a deadly electrified fence on the border with Mexico and Representative Michele Bachmann vowed to make English the government’s official language.
lead_paragraph: In campaign speeches on Saturday, Herman Cain said he would build a deadly electrified fence on the border with Mexico and Representative Michele Bachmann vowed to make English the government’s official language.

headline.main: At Rallies, 2 Candidates Deliver Blistering Attacks on Illegal Immigration
headline.print_headline: At Rallies, 2 Candidates Deliver Blistering Attacks on Illegal Immigration
headline.seo: Bachmann and Cain Deliver Blistering Attacks on Illegal Immigration
